Class EmployeeCitiesEditorController<RIS extends Renderable & IStatable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.broudy.gcm.boundary.enhanced.fxmlrelated.EnhancedFXMLController

  • public class EmployeeCitiesEditorController<RIS extends Renderable & IStatable>
extends EnhancedFXMLController
    This class controls the editing of a city.

    Created on the 11th of August, 2019.

    Author:
    Julian Broudy

      • moveMaps

        private void moveMaps(javafx.scene.control.ListView<RIS> fromList,
                      javafx.scene.control.ListView<RIS> toList)
        A convenience method for reducing duplicate code. This method moves ListView items between 2 ListViews.
        Parameters:
        fromList - the ListView from which to move selected items.
        toList - the ListView which receives moved items.

      • handleListViewArrowKeysTraversal

        private void handleListViewArrowKeysTraversal(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent pressed,
                                              javafx.scene.control.ListView<RIS> listView)
        This method handles "UP" & "DOWN" KeyEvents. This method checks whether the new selection is State.APPROVED. If not, it selects the first selection that is APPROVED depending on the arrow pressed. This method takes into account that the last or first item in list might not be APPROVED and the selection comes from the other end.
        Parameters:
        pressed - is the KeyEvent.
        listView - is the ListView.
